message.raw:
setup.py: now requires Genomedata 1.3.2

segway.observations: observations code from segway._util and
	segway.observations
change observations, task to use Genomedata 1.3.2 list of track_indexes
	subsetting
segway.run.Runner: * add uuid, num_worlds
* num_windows() now a memoized_property
* refactoring of save_obserations_params() to use
	segway.observations.Observations

test/test.sh: remove tied stuff (will go into a separate test script)
